images.prompt: A raw, ultra-realistic 8k photograph of a stunningly beautiful Japanese gravure idol, exuding a cool and independent vibe while standing along a sandy beach shoreline bathed in softbox beauty lighting that ensures a bright, clear, professional exposure without heavy shadows. She wears a loosely tied, high-quality silk bathrobe that accents her slim waist and ample chest, the fabric's texture contrasting with the matte finish color grade. The camera focuses tightly on her hands as she interacts with a string of fairy lights, her delicate fingers gently clutching the glowing wire against a backdrop of a blurred, dreamy coastline. She is captured in a candid moment of an irresistibly cute yawn, her eyes slightly closed and mouth open, showcasing a mix of natural beauty and alluring fatigue. Shot on Sony A7R IV with an 85mm f/1.4 GM lens, featuring ultra-detailed skin texture, depth of field, ray tracing, and global illumination.8k photo, Large breasts, deep cleavage, ample cleavage, sexy photo, beautilful girl without makeup
